Test Piece Contest
Schubert's Symphony in C [arr. J. A. Greenwood]
Southsea, Hampshire Best cornet, horn, flugal and euphonium - Hoo Silver. Best soprano - Horsham Borough. Prizes - 1st £50 and trophy, 2nd £20 and trophy, 3rd £10 and trophy. 5 bands competed.
Nov. 5, 2013, 4:53 p.m. March 20, 2020, 8:13 a.m.
1 Hoo Silver Eric Ball
2 Hanwell Band George Thompson
3 Horsham Borough E. W. Miles

5 Yatesbury R.A.F. Unknown
